outcome: Military officers establish a temporary emergency government pacifying unrest by force.

events.description: Military Pragmatists announce a temporary emergency government, citing security concerns as justification.
Internal directives underscore the need for quickly neutralizing perceived threats to secure the emergency regime.
Reports surface of dissent being stifled quietly; military presence cripples civilian agitation.
Official channels broadcast a coherent narrative of restored order, while citizens experience increased restrictions.
